column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Five of us went there for brunch yesterday. Three ordered egg dishes
column3: one a burger. The three of us that had egg dishes became sick  later
column4: that evening  with diarrhea and/or nausea. Called the manager today
column5: but he dismissed it: he had eggs
column6: he said and was fine. Unresponsive management and potential food poisoning. Find another place to eat.
